title: Bug 14289usability improvements to import external project
description: build M5.If a new developer was brought onto a project where they didn't use CVS, theywould have to import several projects into their workspace.To do this, theywould have to click:File  Import  External Projects.Here they have to browse to the location on disk where projects exist and thenimport one project at a time.It would be a more user friendly solution if the user could choose manyprojects at the time.Or at the very least, remember the last file location the user "browsed" towhen they choose the last project.
